name: Mind Thrust III
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as mind thrust I, but the target takes 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8). This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同心灵戳刺 I（Mind Thrust I）一般，不过目标会受到每施法者等级1d8点伤害（最高10d8点）。该法术可以被降阶施法。
